name: Storiesbk.GitHub.io
tagline: Bookshop and storytelling lab in Brooklyn.
body:
## We believe stories can change the world.
A good story ignites our imagination, curiosity, and passion for learning.

**Stories** is a family business, co-founded by Maggie Pouncey and Matt Miller. In our shop in Brooklyn, we will sell a beautiful collection of childrenâ€™s books for ages zero through young adult, with a section for parents, too; and we will teach a rich catalogue of storytelling classes for kids in our adjacent lab space. Our programs will be offered after school, on weekends, and over the summer.

Copyright 2016, Stories BK, LLC.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
